macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Major Indices Dip Slightly on Friday Amid Light Holiday Trading
items.summary: The S&P 500 slipped 0.03% to 6,929.94, Dow fell 0.04% to 48,710.97, Nasdaq dropped 0.09% to 23,593.10, and Russell 2000 declined 0.54% to 2,534.35 on December 29. Markets remain on track for strong yearly gains led by tech and communications sectors.

items.title: Q3 GDP Surges to 4.3%, Strongest in Two Years, Boosting S&P to New Highs
items.summary: Q3 GDP came in at 4.3%, exceeding estimates by a full percentage point, while the S&P 500 hit fresh records despite subdued holiday trading. Treasuries tested 4.20% yields but ended unchanged.

items.title: Fed Signals Potential Pause on Rate Cuts in January Amid Labor Stabilization
items.summary: Market expectations show only 15% probability of a rate cut at the January 29 Fed meeting, with Chair Powell emphasizing flexibility after labor market data post-government shutdown. Dovish stance anticipated under new chair supports risk-on sentiment.

items.title: Asian Markets Mixed Overnight; Nikkei Drops as US Futures Point Lower
items.summary: Nikkei fell 223 points to 50,526, Hang Seng dropped 183 points to 25,635, while Shanghai rose slightly to 3,965. US stocks looking lower to start final trading days of 2025.

items.title: Municipal Bond Market Steady with Strong Inflows During Holiday Week
items.summary: Municipal market remained quiet with unchanged MMD scale, zero new supply, and over $600 million inflows each from ETFs and funds. Light trading expected to close out the year.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Rises Above $89,000 on Short-Covering
items.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) is trading around $87,900, up roughly 1.3% over the past day, with short-covering activity boosting BTC above $89,000. Ethereum (ETH) has gained about 1.8% to trade near $2,980.

items.title: Beta Finance Surges Over 423% in Major Market Rally
items.summary: Beta Finance leads the market with a sharp surge of more than 423%, followed by ElizaOS which has climbed nearly 150% over the past day. 0x Protocol is also among top gainers, rising around 35%.

items.title: Crypto Derivatives Trading Exceeds $1 Trillion Monthly Volume
items.summary: Decentralized exchanges are processing more than $1 trillion in monthly perpetual futures volume by late 2025, rivaling activity on some centralized venues as traders increasingly turn to onchain perpetual futures.

items.title: Mixed Performance Across Major Cryptocurrencies
items.summary: Most major cryptocurrencies by market cap are trading mixed, with market outperformers including ZRX (up 26%), MANTA (up 11%), and POLYX (up 8%).

items.title: Dragonfly Forecasts Bitcoin Above $150,000 by End-2026
items.summary: Haseeb Qureshi, managing partner at Dragonfly, forecasts that Bitcoin will trade above $150,000 by the end of 2026, though he expects Bitcoin's dominance to decline as capital shifts into other sectors.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: DeepSeek Releases R1 Reasoning Model with Smaller Local Versions
items.summary: AI startup DeepSeek launched DeepSeek R1, a reasoning model optimized for logic, mathematics, and pattern-finding tasks, along with six smaller versions designed to run locally on laptops.

items.title: Insilico Medicine Lists on Hong Kong Stock Exchange as Largest Biotech IPO
items.summary: Insilico Medicine completed its listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange in 2025's largest Hong Kong biotech IPO, advancing AI-driven drug discovery with its upgraded Life Star 2 platform and Pharmaceutical Superintelligence concept.

items.title: Sony AI Releases Fair Human-Centric Image Benchmark for Computer Vision Ethics
items.summary: Sony AI published the Fair Human-Centric Image Benchmark (FHIBE), a consent-based dataset with over 10,000 human images for evaluating bias in computer vision models, establishing a new benchmark for AI ethics.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Reveals Viewfinder as December 29-30 Free Game
items.summary: Viewfinder, a first-person puzzle platformer by Sad Owl Studios, is the latest free game in Epic's 2025 holiday giveaway. The promotion is nearing its conclusion with only a few mystery titles remaining before the Epic Games Store returns to its standard weekly free game schedule in early January.

items.title: Zenless Zone Zero 2.5 Maintenance Scheduled for December 30
items.summary: Zenless Zone Zero will undergo maintenance on December 30, 2025, starting at 6 am UTC+8 and lasting approximately 5 hours until 11 am UTC+8. New content from the 2.5 update will be available after the maintenance period concludes.

items.title: Best Cozy Games of 2025 Highlighted
items.summary: A gaming review site has compiled a list of the best cozy games from 2025, including titles like Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping, Bugtopia, and Squeakross: Home Squeak Home, all receiving perfect scores based on extensive gameplay testing.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
